name: Nano Banana Pro Image Generator and Editor Kie AI
description:
Generates, Edits or Combines image(s) according to text instructions using the Nano Banana Pro model from Google, via the kie.ai API.
Supports up to 8 local images inputs.
Pricing (as of November 2025): ~$0.09 per image for 1K and 2K resolution, ~$0.12 per image for 4K.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: Required API key for kie.ai API authentication

max_duration.description: Optional maximum duration in seconds to wait for task completion. Default: 300 (equal 5 minutes)

polling_interval.description: Optional interval in seconds for polling the task status (how often to check if image generation is complete). Default: 5

output_format.description: Optional output image format. Must be 'png' or 'jpeg'. Defaults to 'png'

aspect_ratio.description: Optional aspect ratio of the created image. Must be one one of '1:1', '2:3', '3:2', '3:4', '4:3', '4:5', '5:4', '9:16', '16:9', '21:9' or 'auto'; defaults to 'auto' (uses API default)

input_image_paths.description: Optional list of local full paths to input images for editing or guidance, up to 8 images. Accepted types: .jpeg, .png, and .webp. Max file size: 30MB

items.description: Local path to an input image

resolution.description: Optional resolution of the output image, must be one of '1K', '2K', '4K'. Default to '2K'.

prompt.description: The text prompt describing the image to generate, or how to edit or combine the input image(s). Max length : 5000 characters.

filename.description: Optional base filename for the created image (without extension). Defaults to None (uses task_id)

saved_image_path.description: Local path where the generated image was saved

status.description: Status of the operation, e.g. 'success', 'error: ...', or 'partial_success: ...'

task_id.description: ID of the created task on Kie.ai

temporary_image_url.description: Temporary URL of the generated image from Kie.ai
